name: NaNoWriMo Word Count Tracker
author: Darren Meehan

sections.description: NaNoWriMo Word Count Tracker is a beta plugin which tracks your progress in NaNoWriMo. Currently it tracks every word in the blog, by every user, this will be changed in future releases.
sections.installation:
1. Upload NaNoWriMo-tracker.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You’ll now see “Your NaNoWriMo progress: 2229/50,000” in the top right corner of your admin panel.
sections.faq:
What is NaNoWriMo

NaNoWriMo stands for National Novel Writing Month, which is a writing project where particapants take on the task of writing a novel of at least 50,000 words in the month of November. See more about it on the projects site.

short_description: Track your progress in National Novel Writing Month.
description: NaNoWriMo Word Count Tracker is a beta plugin which tracks your progress in NaNoWriMo. Currently it tracks every word in the blog, by every user, this will be changed in future releases.
